title: Oscars 2022 Ratings Beat Last Year’s Low, but Still Second-Worst in History
sub_head: ABC’s coverage of 94th Academy Awards drew more than 15 million viewers, early Nielsen data show
body:
More than 15 million people tuned in to watch ABC’s coverage of the 94th annual Academy Awards, according to preliminary numbers from TV-ratings firm Nielsen .
That is a significant increase from last year’s record low of 10.4 million viewers of ABC’s broadcast of the ceremony, which was much smaller in scale due to Covid-19 concerns. ABC is a unit of Walt Disney Co.
